metadata.description: Monthly progress updates — April 2025 to January 2026

highlights: Student and teacher attendance integration is completed for the UT of Ladakh.
Meeting with State/UT VSKs for the integration of all management types of schools.

highlights: Meeting with representatives of 69 boards on 1st May 2025 for the integration of assessment datasets.
For the integration of KPIs related administration, support was extended to the State Bihar (7th May) and UT of Chandigarh through in-person workshops.
Revamp of PM SHRI, NISHTHA dashboards with updated datasets received from respective bureau.
APAAR ID Generation is currently on hold owing to grade progression activity.

highlights: West Bengal became fully operational, bringing the total number of operational Vidya Samiksha Kendras (VSKs) in the country to 37.
Madhya Pradesh integrated with RVSK and commenced sharing teacher attendance data.
User Acceptance Testing (UAT) of the RVSK Portal was successfully completed with Assam, Chandigarh, Madhya Pradesh, and Delhi. The portal is now ready for rollout to other States/UTs.
Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) for RVSK prepared and submitted for approval.
13,93,07,517 APAAR IDs generated in total till 31st July 2025.

state_ut_engagements: West Bengal became fully operational, bringing the total number of operational Vidya Samiksha Kendras (VSKs) in the country to 37.

technical: User Acceptance Testing (UAT) of the RVSK Portal was successfully completed with Assam, Chandigarh, Madhya Pradesh, and Delhi. The portal is now ready for rollout to other States/UTs, and user access will be shared during the upcoming CPD Workshop.
Letter issued on 26th June 2025 for integration of all school management systems with respective State/UT VSKs.
Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) for RVSK prepared and submitted for approval.
apaar: 13,93,07,517 APAAR IDs generated in total till 31st July 2025.

highlights: Capacity Building Workshop 2.0 Conducted at RVSK, CIET-NCERT from 4th-29th August 2025 in five batches, covering all 36 States/UTs/Autonomous Bodies (ABs).

Each State/UT/AB deputed four participants comprising: Nodal Officer-VSK, MIS In-Charge/Coordinator (Samagra Shiksha), Representative from State Education Board (Secondary Education), Headmaster/Headmistress/Teacher from a Government school. A total of 165 participants attended.
Chhattisgarh integrated with RVSK, bringing the total to 33 States/UTs operational.
NCTE VSK made ready for launch, with all hardware, software, and PMU arrangements completed.
Development of dashboards for NIPUN, SAFAL, NAS, and Educational Boards initiated.
Testing and development of an AI Chatbot for Attendance undertaken.
PSSCIVE Vocational Education Document prepared and shared for annual review.
13,99,10,791 APAAR IDs generated in total till 31st August 2025.

September 2025.theme: KPI Booklet Circulation & VSK Site Visits
highlights: A detailed booklet outlining the formulated KPIs along with their corresponding metrics, insights, and data parameters/fields has been developed and circulated to all Examination Boards across India for feedback and review.
Conducted a visit to the CBSE Vidya Samiksha Kendra (VSK) to discuss and review the process of data integration with the Rashtriya Vidya Samiksha Kendra (RVSK).
Conducted a visit to the NIOS Vidya Samiksha Kendra (VSK) to assess and facilitate data integration with RVSK.
Prepared and submitted a comprehensive report to the Ministry of Education (MoE) highlighting the technical and administrative challenges faced by State/UT VSKs across India.
Compiled and submitted a State/UT/District-wise attendance data analysis report to the Ministry of Education (MoE) for review and further action.
Held a meeting with the Deputy Director General (Statistics), Ministry of Education, to deliberate on strengthening data-driven decision-making and enhancing governance in school education.
14,27,88,686 APAAR IDs generated in total till 30th September 2025.

October 2025.theme: Bihar VSK Launch & UDISE+ Data Quality
highlights: The Bihar Vidya Samiksha Kendra has been operationalized and is ready for launch.
Letters have been issued to 10 States/UTs where name mismatches were identified in the UDISE+ database with reference to the LGD (Local Government Directory), Ministry of Panchayati Raj.
A discussion meeting with all 36 states/UTs conducted regarding the enhancement of RVSK portal.
Detailed discussion with Examination Boards for data sharing, KPI analysis and integration with RVSK.
A new Attendance Dashboard has been developed and currently under UAT (User Acceptance Testing) phase.
Redevelopment of the NAS 2017 and 2021 Dashboards based on inputs received from the PARAKH Team, NCERT.
Compiled and shared data request from all States/UTs on the data request from UDISE+ database for digital initiatives like DIKSHA, PM eVidya, VSKs etc.
14,49,00,028 APAAR IDs generated in total till 31st October 2025.

data_quality: Letters have been issued to 10 States/UTs where name mismatches were identified in the UDISE+ database with reference to the LGD (Local Government Directory), Ministry of Panchayati Raj. The States/UTs have been requested to carry out the necessary corrections in UDISE+ to align with the LGD nomenclature, ensuring uniformity and consistency across all national education datasets and reports.

highlights: Letters have been issued to 18 States/UTs where name mismatches were identified in the UDISE+ database with reference to the LGD.
A detailed discussion meeting was held with five states (Gujarat, Assam, Himachal Pradesh, Uttarakhand, and Goa) to plan the pilot testing for integrating Assessment data with RVSK.
A detailed discussion meeting was held with Meghalaya to plan the pilot testing for integrating Administration data with RVSK.

Virtual Knowledge Sharing Session held on 13th November 2025 by RVSK-CIET, NCERT with NIOS, Chhattisgarh, and Madhya Pradesh, focusing on the development and refinement of Publishing and Establishment Dashboards.
Design Review & Data Collection Planning Session held with regard to NCERT Establishment Dashboard.
For integration of the NCTE Vidya Samiksha Kendra (VSK) with the Rashtriya Vidya Samiksha Kendra (RVSK), NCERT, a meeting was convened on 26th November 2025 at RVSK, CIET, NCERT.
14,74,45,958 APAAR IDs generated in total till 27th November 2025.

A detailed discussion meeting was held with Meghalaya to plan the pilot testing for integrating Administration data with RVSK.

highlights: Virtual meetings with Uttarakhand, Meghalaya and Goa to discuss integration of Assessment and Administration data into a unified national monitoring and analytics architecture for school education.
Virtual meeting with Manipur to provide technical support for attendance integration via API.
Andaman & Nicobar Islands (UT) Starter Pack set-up completed and ready for hand-over.
NCERT Establishment Dashboard Design Review and Data Collection Planning Session held; focus on data readiness, KPI finalisation and alignment with NCERT operational needs.
PM-SHRI & Micro-Improvement Dashboard Design enhancements finished, tested and moved to UAT.
NIPUN Assessment Dashboard Enhancements are currently in progress.
As of 31 Dec 2025, 15,32,63,531 APAAR IDs have been generated since the roll-out in September 2024.
